issue.title: [C++][Compute] Implement a parser for expressions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17906](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17906). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I've seen a few people on the mailing list asking for something like this and I've wanted it myself, so I went ahead and implemented a parser for a lisp-like way of generating Expressions. Calls are of the form `{}(<fn> <args>){`}, scalars are of the form `{}$type:value{`}, and field refs are of the form `{}!<dot path>{`}.
